**About**

This is the website of the **Language Technology and Data Analysis Laboratory (LADAL)** of the [School of Languages and Cultures](https://languages-cultures.uq.edu.au/) at the [University of Queensland](https://www.uq.edu.au/), Australia.

&nbsp;

**License**

This website was created by Martin Schweinberger as member of the *Digital Team* of the *School of Languages and Cultures* of the *Univesrity fo Queensland*, Australia. It was freely released under GPLv3 in January 2019. 

&nbsp;

**Citation**

If you use (parts of) it for your own teaching or analysis, please cite this website as:

Schweinberger, Martin (2019): *Practical Introduction to Quantitative Research, Data Processing, Visualization, and Statistical Analyses for Language Science in R*. The University of Queensland, Brisbane.
